5 RecordActionClient::RecordActionClient(QObject *parent) :
6  QObject(parent), _running(false)
7 {
8  _minutes = 1;
9  _seconds = 0;
10  _goal.filename = std::string();
11  _goal.max_time = 0.0;
12  _running = false;
13 }
14 
15 RecordActionClient::~RecordActionClient()
16 {
17  _record_client->cancelAllGoals();
18  delete _record_client;
19 }
20 
21 void RecordActionClient::init()
22 {
23  _record_client = new actionlib::SimpleActionClient<pumpkin_messages::RecordAction>("/pumpkin/recorder_action", false);
24 }
25 
26 void RecordActionClient::setRecordFilename(const QString &filename)
27 {
28  _goal.filename = filename.toStdString();
29 }

31 void RecordActionClient::setRecordTimeMinutes(int minutes)
32 {
33  if (!_running)
34  _minutes = minutes;
35 }

37 void RecordActionClient::setRecordTimeSeconds(int seconds)
38 {
39  if (!_running)
40  _seconds = seconds;
41 }

43 void RecordActionClient::recordFile() {
44  if (_goal.filename.empty()) {
45  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Error: empty filename."), 1000));
46  return;
47  } else if (_minutes == 0 && _seconds == 0) {
48  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Error: Time was set to zero."), 1000));
49  return;
50  }
51  _goal.max_time = double(60 * _minutes + _seconds);
52  ROS_INFO("Starting record file %s", _goal.filename.c_str());
53  _record_client->sendGoal(_goal, boost::bind(&RecordActionClient::recordDoneCallback, this, _1, _2),
54  boost::bind(&RecordActionClient::recordActiveCallback, this),
55  boost::bind(&RecordActionClient::recordFeedbackCallback, this, _1));
56 }
57 
58 void RecordActionClient::recordStop() {
59  Q_EMIT(blockOnRecord(false));
60  if (_running)
61  _record_client->cancelGoal();
62  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Stopped recording"), 1000));
63  _running = false;
64 }
65 
66 void RecordActionClient::recordActiveCallback() {
67  _running = true;
68  Q_EMIT(blockOnRecord(true));
69  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Start recording file %0.").arg(QString::fromStdString(_goal.filename)), 1000));
70 }
71 
72 void RecordActionClient::recordDoneCallback(const actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState &goal,
73  const pumpkin_messages::RecordResultConstPtr &result) {
74  _running = false;
75  Q_EMIT(blockOnRecord(false));
76  bool aborted = (goal == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::ABORTED);
77  switch (static_cast<pumpkin_messages::IOState>(result->state)) {
78  case pumpkin_messages::IOState::BadFile:
79  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Error: BAD. The record file should be corrupted."), 1000));
80  ROS_ERROR("BAD FILE");
81  break;
82  case pumpkin_messages::IOState::EndOfFile:
83  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Error: EOF. There is an error saving record file on disk. Maybe the disk is full."), 1000));
84  ROS_ERROR("END OF FILE");
85  break;
86  case pumpkin_messages::IOState::ErrorOpening:
87  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Error: OPEN. It was not possible to create record file."), 1000));
88  ROS_ERROR("ERROR OPENING FILE");
89  break;
90  case pumpkin_messages::IOState::OK:
91  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Record terminated successfully%0.")
92  .arg(QString(aborted ? ", but it was aborted before the end" : " and with full time")), 1000));
93  ROS_INFO("Playback executed with success.");
94  break;
95  default:
96  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Fatal: UNKNOWN ERROR!"), 1000));
97  ROS_FATAL("UNKNOWN ERROR");
98  }
99  Q_EMIT(recordMinuteFeedback(_minutes));
100  Q_EMIT(recordSecondFeedback(_seconds));
101  Q_EMIT(recordFinished(result->state));
102 }
103 
104 void RecordActionClient::recordFeedbackCallback(const pumpkin_messages::RecordFeedbackConstPtr &feedback) {
105  ros::Time elapsed(feedback->time_elapsed);
106  ROS_DEBUG("Passed %lf time", feedback->time_elapsed);
107  Q_EMIT(recordMinuteFeedback(elapsed.sec / 60));
108  Q_EMIT(recordSecondFeedback(elapsed.sec % 60));
109 }
110 
111 }
